parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240017) at the end, which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions Daniela Mihai, a candidate for senator, and uses her image.  It clearly refers to a specific candidate participating in the election, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide audience in Călărași County, not a private communication. The reach estimate (100K-500K) further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The post's primary objective is to encourage voters to elect Daniela Mihai as senator. Phrases like "Votează Calea Sigură pentru Călărași" ("Vote the Safe Path for Călărași") and "Sunt sigură că voi reuși" ("I am sure I will succeed") directly aim to influence the vote. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a promotional piece focused on a candidate's platform and image, not impartial reporting or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. While the candidate expresses her intentions and beliefs, the post's overall tone and design are clearly intended to promote her candidacy, not simply express a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2948803988603171</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Daniela Mihai), targets a wide audience in Călărași County, and has a clear electoral objective: to influence voters to support her candidacy. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion. The post's design and language are promotional, not journalistic.  While the candidate expresses personal views, the context and intent are undeniably promotional. The paid nature of the Facebook post, with a significant reach (100K-500K), amplifies its potential impact on the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Daniela Mihai</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
ROGER GRAPHIC DESIGN SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 2948803988603171) cu conținut de propagandă electorală, care promovează candidatura Danielei Mihai pentru funcția de senator din partea PSD. Postarea, cu un buget de 1000-1500 RON, a atins 150.000-175.000 de impresii și conține elemente specifice de propagandă electorală, cum ar fi imaginea candidatei, sloganuri precum "Votează Calea Sigură pentru Călărași", și numărul CMF 11240017. Obiectivul evident al postării este influențarea votului în favoarea Danielei Mihai, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea perioadei legale.  Contact: infopunkt@infopunkt.ro, +40727256475, Strada Bucuresti 254, Calarasi 910058, RO.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
